definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)

sentences.english: Please enjoy the Latin dance "Joyful Cowboy".
sentences.chinese: 請欣賞拉丁舞《快樂牛仔》。
下面請欣賞激情澎湃《拉丁舞》。

sentences.english: Most Latin dances use break steps.
sentences.chinese: 拉丁舞裏的大多舞種使用破步。

sentences.english: I went to learn Latin this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天上午我又去學拉丁舞了。

sentences.english: Do you feel up to teaching me Latin dance?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得你能勝任教我拉丁舞的事嗎？

sentences.english: Learn some Latin dance lunges from a choreographer in this free video.
sentences.chinese: 學習一些拉丁舞弓步在這個自由影片編舞。

sentences.english: Du was the Latin dance instructor.
sentences.chinese: 而杜勇則是那裏的拉丁舞老師。

sentences.english: The same couple may compete in both Standard and Latin.
sentences.chinese: 同一對舞者可同時參加標準舞和拉丁舞。

sentences.english: Mambo is a kind of Latin dance.
My Chinese dance and Latin dances are very good.
sentences.chinese: 我的中國舞和拉丁舞都跳得可好了。

sentences.english: By the dancing machine, I learnt Latin dancing.
One of my favorite old things is my Latin dance shoe.
sentences.chinese: 我最愛的一件舊物品是我的拉丁舞鞋。
